text: Lepreau may refer to several places and features in Charlotte County, New Brunswick: *Lepreau *Lepreau Basin, at mouth of Lepreau River *Lepreau Bay *Lepreau Falls, site of Lepreau Falls Provincial Park *Lepreau Parish *Lepreau River **North Branch Lepreau River **West Branch Lepreau River *Lepreau River Wildlife Management Area *Little Lepreau *Little Lepreau Basin, at mouth of Little Lepreau River *Little Lepreau River *Point Lepreau *Point Lepreau Nuclear Generating Station
title: Lepreau
